definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

sentences.english: Online network number please add re ondents buttoning a shirt.
sentences.chinese: 在线网号请加回答者扣扣。

sentences.english: They make it harder for him to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 环环扣扣的这些连接让他难以透气。

sentences.english: The coat hooks in the front.
sentences.chinese: 这件外套从后面用钩眼扣扣住。

sentences.english: Her dress was fastened with hooks and eyes.
You never have a dress before that hooked behind.
sentences.chinese: 你以前从来没有穿过后面扣扣的衣服。

sentences.english: Darling, help me to hook up my dress at the back.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，帮我把礼服背后的钩扣扣上。

definition: Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
to follow each other's accounts (on Weibo etc)
to add sb to one's blacklist (on a cellphone, or in instant messaging software etc)/abbr. for 拉到黑名單|拉到黑名单
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
